pillars.title: What we master end to end
pillars.description: Hardware, orchestration and operations are designed together so your critical workloads stay in control.

compute.title: Bespoke compute fabric
compute.description: Optimised AMD EPYC bare metal steered by our control plane.
points: Latest generation AMD EPYC processors with tuned NUMA profiles
Automated provisioning through hardened images and in-house cloud-init
Real-time observability on density, thermals and disk latency

gpu.title: Specialised GPU farms
gpu.description: Dedicated GPU pods for AI, rendering and streaming, isolated by design.
points: NVLink and NVSwitch pods segmented by workload type
Optimised PCIe routing for ultra-low latency and sustained throughput
Liquid cooling under supervision with predictive alerting

network.title: Controlled backbone and edge
network.description: Active-active network engineered to absorb peaks and secure traffic.
points: Redundant spine-leaf topology spanning European sites
In-house BGP with policies tailored to sensitive workloads
Multi-layer DDoS protection with continuous application inspection

data.title: Sovereign data and storage
data.description: Built for consistency, security and regulatory proximity.
points: High-endurance NVMe volumes aggregated through our software
Multi-domain Ceph for objects, blocks and coherent snapshots
Systematic encryption with key management backed by internal HSM

ops.title: Code-driven operations
ops.description: SRE processes, GitOps and observability embedded into the platform.
points: Infrastructure-as-code GitOps with systematic peer reviews
Dedicated CI/CD pipeline for every platform component
SRE runbooks and scheduled chaos engineering exercises

architecture.title: Three layers serving your workloads
architecture.description: Hardware, software and operations aligned to deliver a coherent experience.

hardware.title: Hardware foundation
hardware.description: We control the lifecycle of hosts and connectivity.
points: Proprietary bare metal with redundant power and cooling
Physical segmentation by service family and security zones
Continuous sensors on energy, thermal and acoustic metrics

platform.title: Cloud platform
points: Kubernetes and Nomad control plane operated by our team
Managed services covering databases, message bus and observability
Private virtual networks, software load balancing and edge BGP

experience.title: Developer experience
experience.description: Consistent interfaces to build, deploy and observe.
points: Public API, CLI and Terraform provider maintained together
Unified portal with real-time metrics and correlated logs
Senior technical support with direct escalation to engineering

assurance.title: What guarantees continuity

security.title: Security
points: Biometric physical access and permanently monitored rooms
Micro-segmented networking with zero-trust policies
Continuous security audits, kernel hardening and automated patching

resilience.title: Resilience
points: Active multi-site operations with orchestrated failover
Orchestrated backups with regular restoration tests
Recovery plans validated through joint exercises with clients

governance.title: Governance
points: GDPR-compliant processes with dedicated internal oversight
Full change traceability with immutable logging
Compliance reviews conducted alongside European partners
